Examples
========

There are two types of examples: `Snippets` are usage examples of only a few lines of code, 
and illustrate a specific function from the package. `Use case scenarios` on the other hand provide 
suggestions for how this package may be used in specific (research) situations.

.. toctree::
    :maxdepth: 2

    Snippets<snippets.rst>
    Use case scenarios<usecases.rst>
